title.rendered: Sports Fitness Training Set | Personal Training | Home Gym Fitness Equipment

content.rendered:
• 1x FABRIC AGILITY LADDER (4m) – Develop fast feet and coordination. Agility ladder drill help improve speed, agility and quickness as well as strengthening joints, ligaments and tendons. Also great for burning calories and ideal for cross-training.
  • 6x HURDLES (23cm) – The 6-pack of lightweight fitness and training hurdles is designed to improve overall footwork technique and coordination. Ideal for football, rugby, baseball, hockey, athletics and personal home gym fitness training.
  • 20x MARKER CONES – (Standard colours – 5x White, 5x Yellow, 5 X Orange, 5x Red). The ultra-durable plastic cones are perfect for small-sided practice games, fitness training and drills for various sports.
  • 1x SKIPPING ROPE – An effective and portable piece of sporting equipment for both a warmup and a serious workout. Jumping rope providers an excellent cardio workout that improves your coordination, burns calories and boosts your metabolism.
  • CARRY BAG – Fitness-in-a-bag, the Ram Sports Fitness Training Set comes in a convenient storage and carry bag making it fitness-on-the-go. There is no excuse to leave home without it.
